Articles.Content: I'm having problem with TWR on the MonoPropellant, I have enough dV to get in a stable orbit, but the MonoProellant engines are too weak and I fall from orbit before making it stable.

I'm having problem with TWR on the MonoPropellant, I have enough dV to get in a stable orbit, but the MonoProellant engines are too weak and I fall from orbit before making it stable.

I have made some fixes that I will upload soonish.

This gives more fuel, better oms, better booster seperation

I have made some fixes that I will upload soonish.

This gives more fuel, better oms, better booster seperation

Alright, thanks for replying.

Continie bulding ISS using Shuttle and Canadaarm

Canadaarm - it is ok. Nice Realy cool Last update removing all problems Mount a module as you wish

The Shuttle - nice! but not enough to fuel gor get to orbit and no stable... Nose moving up and down.. Left and right

International Space Station... The construction...

And I ask something in theme for ISS Community.. May be somebody will help me? Thank you

Edited October 14, 2015 by Irenicus

KSP version: 1.0.4.861

SSP: What ever the latest version is.

FAR/Realism Overhaul: No

Mike, update for ISS- I can install it? Because I already beginning building ISS.

Ok, so I found that there were some old Deadly Re-entry files making the game go haywire on re-entry. Now I have a new question... how can i dock this to other spacecraft? Does the crew module docking port work, or am I supposed to put a docking port on?
The Crewmodul Dockingport works.

The Crewmodul Dockingport works.

Follow up question, can it dock with any of the stock docking ports?

I have a problem, When i use the shuttle it does not let me retract the doors.

Whats wrong?
Once you get out of the UI, it will retract.
